About.title: Who I Am
About.description: Iâ€™m Joris Mathijssen, a Senior Software Engineer and Team Lead at 9292. I specialise in modern .NET 8 backend architecture, secure API design and high-performance distributed systems that power large-scale traveller information services. With more than a decade of experience I combine architectural oversight with hands-on engineering, always aiming for clarity, maintainability and predictable production behaviour.
About.description2: At 9292 I work across backend, web and mobile teams to streamline engineering standards and guide our platform toward .NET 10. I collaborate with external partners to analyse performance deviations, optimise critical request flows and strengthen diagnostics and monitoring.
strengths: API design, versioning and long-term evolution
CI/CD and safe, automated release workflows
